text: Clickjacking is a malicious technique of tricking web users into revealing private information or taking control of their computer while clicking on what look like harmless web pages. == History == The term "clickjacking" was coined by Jeremiah Grossman and Robert Hansen,You don't know (click)jack Robert Lemos, October 2008 that is a combination of the words "click" and "hijacking." ==References== Category:Computer security Category:Internet security
title: Clickjacking
